Importance of attending church regularly

Source: R/gss_vars_117.R
gochurch.Rd

gochurch

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question People have many differing views about what makes a person a good Christian or Jew. Please tell me how important is each of the following to you. Once again, please indicate where you would place your feelings on a scale from 1 to 5. How important is it … A. To attend regularly religious services at church or synagogue.

Values

  • [1] very important

  • [5] not very important

  • [NA(d)] don't know [NA(i)] iap [NA(j)] I don't have a job [NA(m)] dk, na, iap [NA(n)] no answer [NA(p)] not imputable [NA(r)] refused [NA(s)] skipped on web [NA(u)] uncodeable [NA(x)] not available in this release [NA(y)] not available in this year [NA(z)] see codebook
